events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund because the item does not match my order at all.
The issue described involves a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product delivery.
Assigning this case to the refunds specialist team to handle the customer's request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. Let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the product you received and the order number so we can verify the issue?
Here are the photos showing the wrong item delivered. The order number is 54321. Please let me know how to proceed with the refund.
We have confirmed the error with your order. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate the refund being processed so fast.
The refund has been completed, and you should see the funds back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case as your refund was successfully issued and no further action is needed on our side.
